name: ◭ Intergalactic Interpreter ◮
description:
Greetings agent. Your mission is to help mediate between the President of the Earth Federation and the leader of the Triangulans in their peace talks. War must be avoided at all costs. The fate of humanity rests on your shoulders!

Go through dozens of topics across multiple playthroughs in your mission to save humanity and make everlasting peace in this randomly generated visual novel!

Credits
  • Patrick Flattery
  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Simon Peng
